I have the following card available for sale or trade:

1) 1911 T-212 OBAK Ten Million. Graded a PSA 3. A very tough and desirable OBAK on many collectors want list. Here is your chance to own a collectors grade example.

Price: CARD HAS BEEN SOLD  (shipping and insurance included)

First to email me with intent to purchase gets the card.

Email: [url]crazylocomerk@yahoo.com[/url]

Payment accepted: Check, MO, or paypal as a gift

Thanks for looking.
